item.description:
Come join a party with great people, time to meet people individually, group get together, learn some things about the The Law of Attraction, attracting to yourself what you want in life. All for $15.

7-8pm vegetarian potluck

8-9:30 Law of Attraction workshop

9:30-11 Social time

I'll provide some of the food. Bring additional vegetarian entrees, appetizers, snacks or drinks as an option.

Herb Pearce is a relationship therapist and coach for individuals, couples and families, teaches Enneagram workshops and workshops on Life Skills and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

781 648 3737
www.herbpearce.com for complete list of workshops
herb@herbpearce.com
item.name: Singles "Law of Attraction" Workshop, Party, Potluck
